reviews.review:
ZE BESTest :3
For a game with closed world and linear story it will never get old and boring.

Tests are great... especially when they are made by the comletely absurd company like Aperture Science.
GLaDOS is the voice which will allways bring me back to play the main storyline.
Give community lemons and you will get a lot of great tests in return.
Also its quite disappointing that other games don't have a co-op mode like this one.
Świetna gra, ciekawa fabułą i naprawdę ciekawa rozgrywka. Trzeba troszkę w niej myśleć ale to raczej nie problem :)

"I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake."

Edit: GLaDOS could use a hug!
Epic
Simplesmente o melhor fps que joguei.
Brilliant and challenging but there was no cake to lie about in this one :)
Is amazing game but I was specting the cake to appear in this one!! I hope glados some day  give me a cake... because you know she sounds like a good cake maker :P
Quite possibly one of the greatest games ever made. Couldn't recomend this game enough.
cool game : )
A most excellent game. Most excellent.
One of the most innovative games ever.
omg omg omg omg omg omg omg
This is one of the best games ever released!  Just when you think it's over you have two more sections to complete.  Seeing the history of Aperture was pretty sweet!
Original aventura. Me ha sorprendido gratamente. Una vez comienzas a pasar pruebas no hay forma de parar. Adictivo y entretenido.

Buena evolución de Portal. A diferencia de éste, se nota que no es un juego-experimento y ya hay un trasfondo a la historia de Aperture. 

Me ha sorprendido dos cosas: 
-Que vaya tan fluido en mi ordenador actual (x2 4200+) sin ralentizaciones ¡y ejecutando Eclipse y Java de fondo!.
-Las luces dinámicas que se vean tan bien unido a lo anterior. Impresionante la escena inicial.
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.
A superb continuation of the superb original. It's superb.
So far, one of the best games I have ever had on Steam!
one of the best games i've ever played
I recommend Portal 2, because it's a good game.  It's got all sorts of things and it's great.
Awesome game.

everybody knows that owning a pair of cica trainers that light up is a major part of any childs life and this is where the game shines through most. cast in to a medieval jungle in the amazon rainforest just north of the fifth ox bow lake on the corner of the BIG BEND further east than the SMALL BEND your character (tiny toes or shovel)must learn the uses of a tamagotchi and the pro's and con's of using multiple words combined with the lattter in an order which mostly does not make sense to the snake upon nothing else when the first can begin to start as with what the are for the majority must continue and how then it stops.
The funniest game I have ever played.

Jedna z perelek minionych miesiecy (nawet i lat), udowadniajaca zarazem, ze gra logiczna wcale nie musi byc nudna (spodziewana monotonia), a wrecz potrafi niezgorzej trzymac w napieciu od najwiekszych budzetowych molochow. Pomijajac juz niezwykla pomyslowosc zastawianych przed graczem lamiglowek, w dobie obecnych trendow i rozwiazan w postaci przytlaczajacych swoja obszernoscia sandboksowych swiatow jako jedynej slusznej koncepcji na gre dobra i popularna, Portal 2 idac niejako w poprzek tej zgnilej modzie pokazuje, jak mozna zrobic tytul wybitny (na siedmioletnim silniku graficznym!), a przy tym z zupełnie swiadoma i w pelni zamierzona, do bolu liniowa rozgrywka, lecz w sposob kompletnie nieodczuwalny - a to za sprawa genialnej narracji, niedajacej myslec o niczym innym, jak o tym, co wydarzy się juz za moment, jaki zaskakujący zwrot w akcji bedzie tym razem mial miejsce. To styl wypracowywany przez Valve latami, juz dzis szeroko podziwiany i czestokroc nasladowany. Zasluzone 9/10.

With a new story, puzzles, and multiplayer, Portal 2 is an incredible game.  New level mechanics ( as in the gels) make more exciting ways to get out of GlaDOS' labratory. The game has hours of campain and multiplayer chalenges as well.
Super verslavend!!
Отличная игра! Компания и кооператив шикарны. Играть с друзьями - это нечто. Жду редактор карт. Всем советую!
It's one of my best games played (both parts), the game's story and gameplay is awesome
Portal 2 deserves "Game of the Year" rank. This game has excellent story, characters and more good things.
Awesome immersion, one of the year's best!
Всем советую, особенно в кооперативе шикарно играть...

Probably the best physics game around..ever.
In fact, not probably - it is, it really is!
2011년 최고의 게임. 이미 경지에 오른듯한 레벨디자인은 2편에서 더 발전한 느낌이 든다. 싱글플레이만으로도 충분히 걸작이라 평할수 있지만 매순간 감탄을 하면서 즐기게 되는 코옵은 최고!
Good story, but too much of it and not too many puzzles. Puzzles are not the center of the game, but the story. Single-Player campaign in Portal 1 is better.
Best game ever. great story, character development, gameplay, genius puzzles, not too hard or too easy, just challenging and fun! great game from valve as always
Não comprou esse jogo ainda? PORQUE NÃO? Vale cada centavo. E não deixa de jogar em CO-OP depois de terminar em single.
This game is good.
A Great story, excellent voice acting and awesome game mechanics easily make Portal 2 the best game I played all year.  If you havent played Portal or Portal 2 yet, I highly recommend picking it up.
pokręcona gierka logiczna ze znakomitymi tekstami
Best Co-op game i ever played
This and Portal 1 are the only 2 games I have successfully completed (played to the ending) in the past 10 years.

I Really Really Liked this game, although to be able to fully understand the humour and the dynamics of using the portals, I recommend you play Portal 1 first. 
More people should get this game so that I can play the multiplayer more :D
Perfektní !!!! Hra roku 2011.
Prostě bomba! Tohle si VÁŽNĚ zahrajte. Jedná se o herní zážitek jako z jiného světa. Pro mne jasných 11 z 10 :-)
For The Science
Awesome fun, but I still want that cake. ;)

Azon kevés játékok egyike, ami sokkal jobb, mint az első rész!
Nagyon jó fejtörők, és csavaros történet. A poénok örökzöldek, sokadik végigjátszás után is viccesek, és mindig találok új információt.

Ha ez nem elég, akkor érdemes végigjátszani a Portal Stories: Mel nem hivatalos kiegészítőt.
Portal de game die mij nog steeds blijft verbazen
Головоломка,  которая не заставит вас скучать + возможность обмена + хорошая графика + юмор искуственного интелекта = Portal!!!
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake."
Genialer Humor, geniales PuzzleGame

Love the game.. Love the humor in it.
Worth having.

um einiges länger, aber genauso gut, bzw sogar noch besser, als der erste Teil.
Klasse Ende.
Juegazoooo!!!! aun tengo pendiente el modo cooperativo jeje pero el final es una pasada, sensillamente genial ^_^
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.
Denken in anderen Dimensionen....

A los pocos que no lo habráis jugado aún, esta es la oportunidad. A un precio muy recomendable teneis un juego de puzzle único, auténtico y diferente a lo visto hasta ahora en videojuegos y risas garantizadas con campaña cooperativa. 
Y buenos gráficos actuales que no requieren mucho PC, qué más se puede pedir?!
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.
멋진 경험이였다...
Its Good
This Game is perfect!
Great story, great gameplay, great Co-op! I still love this game! :D
Excelente juego. Divertido, entretenido, personajes carismáticos. No te arrepentirás.
I love this game.
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.
Nice game! If you catch a wave, then you can pass the game in one breath ☺

Très bonne suite de l'histoire (il n'y pas de paradoxes avec le mod du 1er portal : Portal Prélude qui se déroule du temps où GlaDOS était encore en construction) , très bon gameplay, très bonne fin... Une durée de vie plus longue que le 1er mais quand même encore trop courte...
Portal 2 - это одна из лучших игр, в которые мне довелось поиграть. Шикарная атмосфера, интересные персонажи, здоровский мультиплеер....В неё стоит сыграть, если вы этого еще не сделали.

Yo dawg, we heard you liked portal.... So we made it better, made new jokes and added co-op.

Seriously though its fun, buy it.
Pretty good game.
Un jeu drôle, amusant, quelques neuronnes à fait travaillé, mais si vous en voulez plus, des addons sont disponbiles ! Un jeu halentant, et une glados toujours aussi antipathique =)
Come promesso da Valve, Portal 2 è ancora meglio del primo!! giù il cappello signori!!!!
Quite possibly one of the best games I've ever played. Great story, intriguing puzzles and one hell of a universe.

Считаю, что это одна из лучших игр десятилетия!
По истечению нескольких лет после своего выхода игра остаётся всё такой же отличной!
simply clever
Мне, конечно, игра понравилась, но я так и не нашел этот глупый торт.
ancora non ce l'hai?
Amazing Puzzle game. Just hard enough to get you to really think, but easy enough to have loads of fun.
this game is an amazing puzzle game, however it lacks in cake.
Avaruushan on kakkua hauskempi asia.
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.
You should play both Portal and Portal 2!
Mir gefällt dieses Spiel wirklich gut, ich konnte aber diesen blöden Kuchen nicht finden.
Good Game! Get on it

Ирга просто блеск, качество графики навысоте, прикольный сюжет особенно прикольно получилось в конце с луной, интересно было-бы увидеть портальную пушку в HALF-LIFE 2, вот это был бы номер.
Рекомендую эту Игру всем всем, тем более что её можно совместно и проходить и просто в команде играть. Как говориться одна портальная пушка хорошо а две здорово!
제 2011년 최고의 게임입니다. 첫플레이때는 감동의 연속이었습니다.
Portal 2 ，某些層度來說 GLaDOS 婊人的存在才是玩這個遊戲的重點吧 XD
Honestly a great game for those who want to play something different. I especially loved the ending LOL's.
Если вам нехватает приключений, говоломок и вы любите философию бесконечного портала, а также механический голос постоянно разговаривающий с тем кто молчит , то эта игра для вас )))))))
Who could possibly NOT play this you fool!?!?!
Si el primero era bueno, este es genial.
This game is amazing, because of the difficult puzzles
Très bon jeu malgré une durée de vie aseez légère :)
Now your thinking with portals!
Macht echt Spaß, besser als Portal 1 :)
годы спустя - лучшее что может случиться с вами после консервации!
I really like this game but couldn't find the cake!
8.5/10 Que juegazo que es Portal 2 . Tiene toda la escencia del primero, pero añade suficientes cosas nuevas para hacerlo interesante por si solo. Y lo mejor! El humor sigue ahi presente! :D
Amazing game. Very interesting puzzles with likable characters and a good story.
